name: Deal Deals for Woocommerces by Harimay
author: Harimay

sections.description: This plugin provided a new tab in product single page admin section where user can set the prices an quantity of the product and a tab to set the product deals timing
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/deal-deals-by-harimay directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Products->Daily Deals Setting screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Provided a new tab in CPT Product admin section and a tab to set the product deals timing.
description: This plugin provided a new tab in product single page admin section where user can set the prices an quantity of the product and a tab to set the product deals timing
